answers.answer: Thanks for using the forum.Gestational diabetes, especially if untreated can lead to preterm labor. This is often related to the other complications caused by gestational diabetes such as placenta abruption, large birth weight, and elevated blood pressure in the mother.I hope this helps answer your question.Cathy

question: Hi,How does Gestational Diabetes cause early labor? I know that it can... but I am wondering how or why...  ?Thank you.
title: How does Gestational Diabetes cause early labor?
